meanings.sent1: The movie was unawesome, it didn't make me feel amazed at all.
meanings.sent2: The party was unawesome, nobody seemed impressed by it.
meanings.sent3: The magician's tricks were so unawesome that everyone started laughing.
meanings.sent4: The unawesome performance left the audience feeling underwhelmed.
meanings.sent5: The unawesome painting failed to capture anyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: His unawesome skills in basketball made it hard for him to score any points.
meanings.sent2: The unawesome presentation did not impress the clients.
meanings.sent3: The chef's unawesome attempt at baking a cake resulted in a burnt disaster.
meanings.sent4: The unawesome mountain was nothing compared to the majestic peaks nearby.
meanings.sent5: The unawesome singer struggled to hit the right notes during the performance.
